sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script is used for upgrading customer to update their business process to new fields</description> <name>Update life cycle stage and status</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_business_process'); gr.query(); gr.setWorkflow(false); gr.setValue('life_cycle_stage','Ideation'); gr.setValue('life_cycle_stage_status','Under Evaluation'); gr.updateMultiple();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-22 07:24:32</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e344755f73131010ec95d11ee2f6a76e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update life cycle stage and status</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="CMDB - Business Process" source="com.snc.cmdb_business_process">b5abfc643c35311068bcf327dfe37fbd</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e344755f73131010ec95d11ee2f6a76e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-22 07:24:32</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update life cycle stage and status
